block.p: TEITELBAUM-Lew. My sweetheart, my adored husband, the longest year of my life, just interminable. My heart is broken and my arms are empty. The pain of missing you takes my breath away. My oh so handsome, smart, funny, beloved best friend. I await you at the door and run to answer your phone call. I still can't believe it. My need to see you, talk to you & touch you is overwhelming. My darling, my precious, my excellent strong man. I will miss you and love you forever. Your Sooky

TEITELBAUM-Lew. My sweetheart, my adored husband, the longest year of my life, just interminable. My heart is broken and my arms are empty. The pain of missing you takes my breath away. My oh so handsome, smart, funny, beloved best friend. I await you at the door and run to answer your phone call. I still can't believe it. My need to see you, talk to you & touch you is overwhelming. My darling, my precious, my excellent strong man. I will miss you and love you forever. Your Sooky
